name: Divine Japan
introduction: Great Japan is the divine land. The heavenly progenitor founded it, and the sun goddess bequeathed it to her descendants to rule eternally. Only in our country is this true; there are no similar examples in other countries. This is why our country is called the divine land.
declaringWar: You will be destroyed by the Divine Power.
attacked: Gods are very angry. Results will be very serious.
defeated: We believe the imperishableness of the divine land!
introduction: You must feel glorious to see us.
tradeRequest: We hope you know our quest and your situation.
